title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding. 

Description: If the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart when the key is blank in the properties file.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title even if the key is blank in the properties file.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set an externalized text in the chart title.
2. Keep the key blank in the properties file and try to display the externalized text in the chart title.
